original_text: I will do this that they may lack bread and water, and look at one another in dismay, and rot away because of their punishment.
korean_text: 떡과 물이 부족하여 피차에 두려워 하여 떨며 그 죄악 중에서 쇠패하리라

sentences.original_text: that they may lack bread and water
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 떡과 물이 부족하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and look at one another in dismay
and rot away because of their punishment
